org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors

Interface ReactorImpl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, Closeable, java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PoolThreadReactorImpl

    public interface ReactorImpl
extends Closeable, java.lang.Runnable, Blade
    Base class for internal reactor implementations.
